lead_paragraph: SUTTON--Colonel James George, USAF retired, died aged 95 in Oakwood, OH. The former Chief of Staff, Aerospace System's Division, WPAFB, he served with courage in WWII and Korea and received countless honors for his service. Jim was full of fun and life. He will be missed by his loving relatives and devoted friends. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SUTTON, COLONEL JAMES GEORGE
